attributes.action: take a more balanced approach to reducing global warming that encourages reduced carbon output BOTH in the uk and particularly within the larger polluters (such as USA, India, China)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK only outputs 2% of the world carbon output. I agree strongly that we must do everything we can to reduce our contribution to global warming, but the pain of this will not be worth it if we can not get the other major polluters to change their ways.
